text: Duilio Arigoni (December 6, 1928 - June 10, 2020) was a Swiss chemist. He was an Emeritus Professor at ETH Zurich. He worked on the biosynthetic pathways of many organic natural substances. He was also a visiting professor at Harvard University and Cambridge University. He has worked as a professor at ETH Zurich for over fifty years. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. Arigoni died on June 10, 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss chemists Category:Wolf Prize winners Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:People from Lugano
title: Duilio Arigoni
